caption.title: Performance of age-based TasP in sensitivity experiment in simulations [ Table 3, perturbation 14] in which all of the primary age-related risk factors except for age-related homophily were removed (i.e., in a model in which relationship durations, transmission rates, and probabilities were all independent of age).
caption.p: (a) Incidence 20â€“25 years after the TasP campaign. (b) AIDS deaths between years 0 and 25. (c) Person-years of therapy. (d) Percentage of HIV+ people initiating treatment at the start of the TasP campaign who were not a member of a target group. Error bars present standard deviations based on 32 replicates.
